description.text: A collection of matchboxes with the following content or words depicted: 1. Sirius 2. Oomrao Jan 3. Kadambari 4. Chabuk Swari 5. Untitled (a couple under a tree) 6. Untitled (a portrait of a European woman) 7. Kadam Lila 8. Under the shade of the palm 9. Untitled (an Indian woman vested with a sari and blouse) 10. Untitled (a European woman with her hand on her head) 11. Untitled (a European woman with a hat, in black and white) 12. ?:o 5017 13. Dadja Stambole 14. Mermaid 15. Untitled (a European woman with her hands clasped together) 16. Woman & tigers 17. Hindu Lady 18. Untitled (a European woman, smelling flowers) 19. Untitled (three Indian women sitting together) 20. Queen of England 21. Delavarjan 22. The Grace 23. Untitled (a European woman in blue and red dress) 24. Kolumna Zygmunta III Warszawa, Polski Monopol, Zapa?czany 25. The Sundari 26. Indian Beauty 27. Dancing Girl 28. Tanjore Beauty 29. Untitled (an Indian woman wearing a sari) 30. La Hamaca, the swing. All matchbox covers except for one (No. 24) bear the inscription "made in Sweden".

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.
